record.title: RECESS
record.chair: Under the previous order, the Senate will stand in recess until after the official Senate photograph.
Thereupon, at 12:43 p.m., the Senate recessed until (2:31 p.m.), and reassembled when called to order by the Presiding Officer (Mr. Carper).

speaking.paragraph: I suggest the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.
The assistant legislative clerk proceeded to call the roll.
